sentences.en: An earthquake measuring 6.1 on the Richter scale struck southern California on June 28.
sentences.cn: 6月28日加州南部地区发生了里氏6.1级地震。

sentences.en: Cheng - Min asking the Assembly to make earthquake to speak.
sentences.cn: 汪成民 要求在大会上作震情发言.

sentences.en: Decision - making analysis of earthquake - resistant fortification standards of high dams is also discussed.
sentences.cn: 本文探讨了高坝 抗震 设防的决策问题.

sentences.en: Eccentric braced frame ( EBF ) is an ideal earthquake - resistant structure.
sentences.cn: 偏心支撑框架 ( EBF ) 是一种比较理想的的抗震结构.

sentences.en: Efforts continue to bury earthquake victims in mass graves.
sentences.cn: 遇难者的尸体在继续被集体埋葬.

sentences.en: Express your love for the children in earthquake - hit areas.
sentences.cn: 为震区的孩子们,献出你的爱.

sentences.en: Finally, 3 kinds of methods for forecasting mine's fault - type earthquake are recommended.
sentences.cn: 最后提出3种有效的预测该类矿震的方法.

sentences.en: How to relieve disaster and pray blessing after the earthquake?
Let us stay together to overcome this strong earthquake.
sentences.cn: 让我们携手共进,一起度过这个难关.

sentences.en: People trapped in the earthquake must be very scared.
sentences.cn: 受困于废墟中的人们一定很惊慌.

sentences.en: Products with noise, earthquake, the impact of anti - wear, such as good performance.
sentences.cn: 产品具有隔音 、 防震 、 防 磨损抗冲击等良好性能.

sentences.en: Selling the company caused an earthquake among the employees.
sentences.cn: 出售公司的消息在员工中产生了巨大震动.

sentences.en: The anomalies with multiple items and great extent earthquake would occur.
sentences.cn: 异常项目多且幅度大,已具备了强震发生的条件.

sentences.en: The city is in an earthquake zone.
The paper first analyzes the earthquake disasters of underground pipelines.
sentences.cn: 在本文中,首先分析了埋地管线的震害特征.

sentences.en: With the increase of earthquake, the displacement of the slope accumulatively increases.
sentences.cn: 与塑性区相对应,随着震动次数的累加, 边坡的位移也会累积增长.

sentences.en: You should thank your lucky stars that you survived the earthquake.
sentences.cn: 你还能在地球上生存,你应该为此感到幸运.
